department: Department of Public Works and Government Services
short_summary: Automatic Identification Technology (AIT) Project Fuel Management Stream
description: The Automatic Identification Technology (AIT) Project will procure and implement automated data capture technologies and corresponding supporting Information Technology infrastructure across the Defence Supply Chain (DSC) to enhance operational support and improve the accuracy of Defence corporate reporting. There are three major capabilities being delivered as distinct workstreams: Fuel Monitoring (FM); In Transit Visibility (ITV); and Materiel Management (MM). This RFI focuses on the FM workstream.
full_summary:
### Automatic Identification Technology (AIT) Project Fuel Management Stream

#### Reference
+ Reference Number: WS3383645811-Document 4539215251
+ Solicitation Number: WS3383645811
+ Amendment Number: 1

#### Project Overview
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) intends to acquire and implement automated data capture technologies and supporting Information Technology infrastructure to enhance operational support and improve the accuracy of Defence corporate reporting.

#### Request for Information
The AIT Project aims to deliver three major capabilities: Fuel Monitoring (FM), In Transit Visibility (ITV), and Materiel Management (MM). This Request for Information (RFI) focuses on the FM workstream, which has been separated into three distinct Statements of Work (SOWs). The PSPC invites industry stakeholders to provide written feedback on the approach to deliver the FM requirement by April 25, 2024, at 2:00 PM EDT.

#### Key Information

* **Procurement Category:** Services
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Trade Agreements:** Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), and others (see attached document)
* **Regions of Opportunity:** Canada
* **Regions of Delivery:** Canada
* **Contact Information:**
	+ Name: Cairney, Vanessa (SPAC/PSPC)
	+ Email: vanessa.cairney@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
	+ Phone: None
	+ Fax: None

#### Notice URL
https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19421952?extsite=MTk0MjE5NTJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

Note: The original document contained numerous errors in spelling and grammar, and much of the information was redundant or unnecessary for the context of this RFI. I have reformatted the text to be more concise and clear, while also rephrasing certain sections to improve their readability and coherence. The revised entry meets the 400-word limit and includes only the most relevant and important information.
